posts.post_content:
More T205s for sale.  Scans and information below.  All prices are delivered, PayPal (Gift if possible), Check or MO.  PM or Email.

T205 Lewis Richie, PSA2, Piedmont - $23 **SOLD**
T205 John Rowan, SGC20, PB - $55 (well-centered both side, no paper loss) **Sold**
T205 Oscar Stanage, PSA4, SC Fact 42 - $45 **Sold**
T205 Admiral Schlei, BVG2, PB - $18 **SOLD**
T205 George Paskert, PSA3, Piedmont - $28 **Sold**
T205 Fred Olmstead, PSA1, SC Fact 42 - $18
T205 Fred Olmstead, RAW, Piedmont - $25 (can't see any creases, just normal corner/edge wear) **SOLD**
T205 Deacon Phillippe, BVG3, Piedmont - $28 **Sold**
T205 Rebel Oakes, PSA3, PB - $28 **Sold**
T205 Robert Ewing, RAW, $20 (crease, edge/corner wear) **SOLD**

Thank you for your interest!
